Module.Content:
<iframe id="groups_embed" src="javascript:void(0);" width="800" height="600" scrolling="no" frameborder="0"></iframe>
<script type="text/javascript">
  parentUrl = encodeURIComponent(window.location.href);
  parentUrl = parentUrl.match(/https?:\/\/.+/) ? parentUrl : null;
  document.getElementById("groups_embed").src = "https://groups.google.com/forum/embed/?place=forum%2Fchromebook-central&showsearch=true&theme=default" + (parentUrl ? ("&parenturl=" + parentUrl) : "");
</script>
